page.title: 04A WEEKEND IN FLITWICK.
page.content: {SATURDAY. I DID SOME HOMEWORK WHILE MY SISTER WAS AT GYMNASTICS.LATER WE WENT TO HATFIELD TO SEE SOME FRIENDS.WE WENT TO A SCHOOL FETE THERE, AND I WON A FOOTBALL AND 50P,THEN WE WENT SHOPPING WHERE I GOT A MAGAZINE AND A BOOK,(I ALSO HAD AN ICE-LOLLY).THAT EVENING I HAD A BATH WHICH I PLAYED JAWS IN.I WATCHED T.V,READ MY BOOK AND WENT TO BED. {SUNDAY. I DID SOME MORE HOMEWORK.AFTER LUNCH I HELPED MUM TO WASH THE CAR,AFTER THAT I PLAYED TENNIS (I'M GETTING BETTER AT IT).I HAD TEA AND ANOTHER BATH AND PLAYED JAWS IN IT AGAIN,THEN I WATCHED T.V,ATE MY CRISPS,READ MY MAGAZINE AND WENT TO BED.
